articles.title: Kim Jong Un Appreciates Demonstration Performance of Newly Organized Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Appreciates Demonstration Performance of Newly Organized Moranbong Band
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, appreciated a demonstration performance given by the newly organized Moranbong band on Friday.
					 Kim Jong Un organized the Moranbong band as required by the new century, prompted by a grandiose plan to bring about a dramatic turn in the field of literature and arts this year in which a new century of Juche Korea begins. 
					
					 The band just several months old raised its curtain for its significant demonstration performance proclaiming its birth before the world.
					
					 The repertoire of the performance divided into two parts included colorful numbers such as light music "Arirang", female vocal quintet "Let's Learn", light music "Yeppuni", light music and song "Victors", female trio "Silk Weaving Girl of Nyongbyon", string quartet "We Can't Live without his Care", foreign light music "Chardash", "Victory", "Song of Gypsy", female sextet "Fluttering Red Flag" and light music and song "Suite of World Fable Songs."
					
					 The performers showed well the indomitable spirit and mental power of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK dashing ahead for the final victory in the drive to build a thriving nation under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					  The band staged a performance of strong individual character for being revolutionary and appealing in contents and unique, peculiar, modern and popular in style.
					
					 Just 10 odd musicians presented such sublime, rich and thrilling melodies as those of a grand orchestra with refined rendition while young singers sang songs in an emotional and cheerful manner as required by the music, making the audience seized with excitement and joy throughout the performance.
					
					 At the end of the performance Kim Jong Un waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the creators and artistes staged a performance high in ideological and artistic value by displaying revolutionary creative spirit. He congratulated them on their successful demonstration performance and extended thanks of the Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 He said repeatedly that the performance given by the band was the one spurring the revolution and construction, a stirring and unique one reflecting the breath of the times and the one which reached a new phase in its contents and style.
					
					 All of the musicians and singers of the band are promising, he noted, praising Sonu Hyang Hui, leader of the band, for her splendid directing.
					
					 He underscored the need to steadily develop the traditional music and popular music in a balanced manner to suit the thoughts and feelings of Koreans and their aesthetic taste while meeting the need of the times and the people's desire. 
					
					 He expressed the expectation and conviction that the creators and artistes of the band would creditably fulfill in the future, too, their mission as a dynamic bugler, engine and genuine companion of the army and people in the efforts to glorify the country, the patriotic legacy left by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Ki Nam, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Choe Pu Il, Kim Myong Guk, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, and officials, creators, artistes, writers and journalists of literary and art, media and art educational institutions.

articles.title: DPRK Documentary Screened on Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
DPRK Documentary Screened on Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A Korean documentary film "The Great Life in 1994" was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The film deals with the unforgettable revolutionary activities of the President in 1994, the year of his passing. 
					
					 It tells that the life of the President was the noble one of the peerlessly great man and the peerlessly political elder who made contributions to accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and global independence.
					
					 The film emphasizes that the feats the President performed by devoting himself to achieving national reunification, the prosperity of the country and the well-being of its people and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and global independence to the last moments of his life will last forever along with the prosperity of the sun's Korea.  
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and other senior party and state officials and officials of power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and working people.

articles.title: CPRK  Accuses Lee Myung Bak of His Reckless Remarks against DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK  Accuses Lee Myung Bak of His Reckless Remarks against DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) on Saturday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the recent provocative remarks made by traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea against the DPRK:
					 On July 3 Lee blustered "the south would take several times stronger retaliation if the north provokes in the future", asking a country to convey such stand. He even talked nonsense that the naval skirmish in the West Sea in 2002 was orchestrated by the north to meet its strategic purpose.
					
					 On June 29 the traitor pulled up the north, asserting that the "Cheonan" warship incident and the Yonphyong Island shelling incident were premeditated provocations of the north. During his recent foreign junkets, he bragged that "should the north provoke, it will face stronger retaliation."
					
					 This is nothing but a shriek of an old man on death-bed. 
					
					 The puppet group is seized with extreme uneasiness and fear, taken aback by the resolution of the army and people of the DPRK to deal merciless retaliatory blows at it for its crimes against the nation and ethics.
					
					 The ruling crisis of Lee has reached such pass where it is beyond control before the end of his tenure of office. He is finding himself in the ever more catastrophic situation due to the disclosure of hideous scandals of his families and relatives and confidants and his moves to conclude a military agreement with Japan.
					
					 Lee's provocative remarks cannot be interpreted otherwise than a ridiculous behavior to soothe his clans suffering from persecution complex due to their crimes committed against the nation, improve his tattered image, divert elsewhere the attention of the angry public and thus weather the worst crisis.
					
					 Due to the reckless confrontation rackets kicked up by the Lee group under the patronage of the U.S. the tension on the Korean Peninsula is escalating with each passing day and the danger of a war has reached a serious phase.
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly proves that it is none other than the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group that are disturbing peace on the peninsula.
					
					 Lee is kicking up hysteria with bluffing and ill-advised bravery, kowtowing to the U.S., but his American master would not help him escape the merciless punishment by the DPRK.
					
					 The lackeys' lot was always pitiful as only abandonment, doom and death awaited them.
					
					 If the traitor continues running recklessly like a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger, he will never be able to escape such miserable end as that of the erstwhile dictators including Syngman Rhee and Park Chung-Hee and the pro-U.S. lackeys of South Vietnam.
					
					 Days are numbered when the traitor will meet his doom.

articles.title: Pomminryon North HQ Assails Lee Group's Renewed Confrontational Hysteria
articles.content:
Pomminryon North HQ Assails Lee Group's Renewed Confrontational Hysteria
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea is getting frantic to crack down upon Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) after his return to the south. He visited the DPRK to take part in an event to commemorate the 100th day since the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il carrying deep condolences of south Koreans of different social standings.
					 The puppet group created a terror-ridden atmosphere by massively hurling puppet forces in full military gear into the south side's portion in Panmunjom and setting in motion gangster-like hangmen of the Intelligence Service (IS) and the Ministry of Unification specializing in oppressing the pro-reunification patriots. They did not hesitate to commit such a barbarous crime as taking away Ro like an animal with his neck, arms and legs tightly held just as he crossed the demarcation line. They carried Ro to the Phaju Police Station in Kyonggi Province to inquire him, not allowing him to go home.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that the puppet group of traitors bribed such wicked and mean human scum as those of the "alliance of the elders" and the "society of families of south Korean abductees" to hold "protest rallies" at the entrance of the "Unification Bridge" in Phaju City of Kyonggi Province and made no scruple of perpetrating such hideous provocation as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Timed to coincide with their provocative acts, ultra-right conservative media including Chosun Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo and Daily NK have vied with each other to make invectives against Ro's visit to Pyongyang, claiming that he praised the DPRK and denounced the Lee Myung Bak "government". 
					
					 They also forcibly searched Ro's house and the office room of the Pomminryon South Headquarters and arrested its secretary general without warrant.
					
					 The puppet group of traitors did not hesitate to commit such thrice-cursed crimes as daring hurt the supreme leadership of the DPRK again with Ro's return as an occasion, bringing to bolder relief their true colors as confrontational maniacs. All these facts go to clearly prove once again that they are, indeed, fascist hooligans, brutes in human form and worst villains hell-bent on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Pomminryon North Headquarters vehemently condemns the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for their on-going vicious anti-DPRK confrontation and fascist crackdown on it, labeling them as another intolerable grave challenge to it and treacherous and anti-reunification criminal acts destroying the nation's reconciliation and unity and inciting confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 Ro's Pyongyang visit was a token of due courtesy prompted by the desire to share sorrow over the great loss to the nation as a member of the Korean nation and achieve national unity and reunification and an entirely righteous and heroic action that deserve admiration by all Koreans in view of the traditional beautiful manners and customs of the Korean nation and the spirit of national reconciliation and unity. This can never be a crime. 
					
					 It is none other than the Lee Myung Bak group of worst traitors that deserves punishment because it leveled guns at the fellow countrymen mourning over the big loss to the nation and barred south Koreans of many political parties and organizations and individuals from paying condolatory visits to Pyongyang. 
					
					 The Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification is a tripartite solidarity organization common to the nation recognized at home and abroad as it reflects the unanimous desire for reunification of Koreans in the north and the south and overseas. It has permitted its leading members to discuss the issues related to reunification, irrespective of their residing places, and done a lot of work for independence and peaceful reunification in the June 15 era.
					
					 But the Lee Myung Bak fascist dictatorial "government", an anti-reunification regime, has branded the Pomminryon South Headquarters as forces following the north, stamping out freedom of the movement for reunification and bringing its members to prisons and courts almost every day. Not content with this, the regime is imposing all sorts of inhuman molestation and suppression upon them, depriving them of even elementary human rights.
					
					 Rare to be found in the world are such despicable confrontation maniacs as the Lee Myung Bak group which barred Ro from going back to the south via Panmunjom. His Pyongyang visit was very just as he shared sorrow with fellow countrymen in the north over the great loss to the nation and took part in the events for reunification with them.
					
					 The group was so disgusting as to ask the U.S. aggression forces in south Korea to let persons concerned of the "UN Command" issue through a loudspeaker from the morning a warning against Ro Su Hui's approach to Panmunjom. 
					
					 The group's brutal suppression of Ro admits of no excuse because it already knew that south Korean people of different circles including members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon were awaiting for Ro to welcome his return through Panmunjom.
					
					 Now people in the north who gave Ro Su Hui warm hospitality and good send-off are hardly repressing their resentment at the barbarous crime committed by the puppet gangsters in Panmunjom.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are replete with the will to wipe out conservative group including the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which perpetrated such a hideous provocation as daring hurt again the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee group will never be able to escape a stern punishment as it committed an indelible treason before the nation.
					
					 Organizations at all levels and people of south Korea should turn out as one in a nationwide struggle to get the notorious "Security Law" abolished, secure the release of pro-reunification patriotic champions including Ro Su Hui, make a clean sweep of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and open a fresh phase for independent reunification.

articles.title: Pomminryon HQ Jointly Condemn S. Korean Authorities for Suppression of Ro Su Hui
articles.content:
Pomminryon HQ Jointly Condemn S. Korean Authorities for Suppression of Ro Su Hui
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a joint impeachment statement Saturday. It denounced the south Korean conservative authorities for their unethical human rights abuses and crimes against reunification. 
					 Before the eyes of northerners who came to Panmunjom to see off Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, the south side conservative authorities carried him away like an animal. They are now investigating him with the mobilization of a joint investigation team made up of the prosecution, police and the "Intelligence Service", inflicting whole gamut of mental and physical pain and sufferings on him.
					
					 They seized and searched the office of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and houses of Ro Su Hui and the secretary general of the headquarters and arrested the secretary general of the headquarters. They even let ultra-right conservative organizations commit hideous crimes hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Ro's Pyongyang visit was prompted by his will to express condolences over the great loss to the nation as a member of the same nation, share the grief with the fellow countrymen in the north and open up the way for national reconciliation, unity and reunification, the joint statement said, adding:
					
					 His acts can never be subject to suppression as they were quite just in view of the ethics and morality, traditional beautiful manners and customs of the Koreans and even in light of national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 The south side authorities should immediately apologize before the nation for their harsh suppression of Ro and unconditionally set free all pro-reunification champions whom they put into custody for unwarranted reasons. 
					
					 The ultra-right conservative organizations keen on stamping out the Pomminryon South Headquarters and other reunification movement organizations while siding with the authorities' racket for "eliminating forces following the north" should immediately stop hideous provocations that can lead to escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen and war.

articles.title: Pomminryon U.S. HQ Denounce Lee Myung Bak Group for Fascist Violence
articles.content:
Pomminryon U.S. HQ Denounce Lee Myung Bak Group for Fascist Violence
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) in a statement on Friday denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its fascist crackdown upon Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of Pomminryon South Headquarters.
					 The statement fully supported the righteous action of Ro Su Hui, who visited Pyongyang to take part in the commemorations of the 100th day since the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and went back to south Korea via Panmunjom. 
					
					 It expressed indignation over the action of the Lee Myung Bak "government" which arrested Ro Su Hui on charges of violation of "Security Law" (SL) immediately after his return to south Korea and committed fascist suppression on the Pomminryon South Headquarters.
					
					 His condolatory visit was an expression of the traditional beautiful manners and customs of the Korean nation of taking great account of etiquette, and a decision to put back on track the south-north relations that had severed since Lee came to the power, it said, and went on:
					
					 If the Lee "government" expressed condolences over the great loss to the nation and allowed non-governmental organizations' condolatory visits in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, a golden opportunity would have been made to remove the tension and conflicts, rebuild trust between the south and the north of Korea and lay a springboard for peace and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 But the Lee "government" turned down this requirement of the nation.
					
					 As a consequence, Ro paid a condolence visit, a righteous action for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration, which showed the will of all compatriots to advance toward independence, peace and reunification despite of any oppression and obstruction.
					
					 In case the Lee conservative forces kick up the racket of confrontation and commit fascist suppression by charging Ro in violation of "Security Law", they would certainly be judged by history.
					
					 The history will clearly remember which road led to patriotism and which one to treachery. 
					
					 Ro covered the road of patriotism alone this time. But hundreds of thousands of people will follow in his footsteps to break down the barrier of confrontation and bring into full bloom the flower of the June 15 independent reunification.
					
					 The Lee "government" trying to prolong his waning political life with all kinds of corruption and misrule should stop crackdown upon the pro-reunification movement and release arrested pro-reunification champions including Ro Su Hui at once.
					
					 We will certainly usher in a new phase of independent reunification under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" in the spirit of Pomminryon.

articles.title: Pomminryon Regional HQ Demand Release of Ro Su Hui
articles.content:
Pomminryon Regional Headquarters Demand Release of Ro Su Hui
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The regional headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued statements on Thursday demanding the release of Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					 The European Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon in its statement bitterly denounced the sycophantic and traitorous regime of south Korea for binding Ro Su Hui with a rope, not content with handcuffing him, and arresting him on charge of violation of the "Security Law", an outdated fascist law, upon his crossing the demarcation line in Panmunjom.
					
					 The statement demanded that the SL be abolished by the force of national conscience as it is used for protecting the regime.
					
					 It urged the south Korean "government" authorities to release Ro Su Hui and other members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon without conditions.
					
					 The Canadian Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon in its statement condemned the south Korean authorities for abusing the return of Ro for their racket against "forces following the north" and for their coloring offensive.
					
					 The statement said the headquarters would wage a dynamic struggle for the release of Ro and the repeal of the SL.
					
					 The anti-reunification conservative forces in south Korea should unconditionally release Ro, bearing deep in mind that their reckless acts to escalate the confrontation with compatriots are only harmful to the reconciliation and unity of the nation, it noted.

articles.title: DPRK, Russia Sign Treaty on Order in Border
articles.content:
DPRK, Russia Sign Treaty on Order in Border
 Moscow, July 6 (KCNA) -- An inter-governmental treaty on order in DPRK-Russia border was signed between the DPRK and the Russian Federation in Moscow on Thursday.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and members of the embassy from the DPRK side and Igor Morgulov, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned from the Russian side.
					
					 Kim Yong Jae and Igor Morgulov signed the treaty.

articles.title: Fascist Suppression of Pro-reunification Patriot under Fire
articles.content:
Fascist Suppression of Pro-reunification Patriot under Fire 
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group resorted to fascist suppression of Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, who went back to south Korea via Panmunjom after wrapping up his Pyongyang visit on July 5.
					 This is touching off towering resentment among all Koreans.
					
					 The moment Ro crossed the demarcation line in Panmunjom, agents pounced upon him like a pack of wolves and wrested from his hands a bunch of flowers and a Korean Peninsula flag associated with the warm compatriotic feelings of the compatriots in the north before throwing them on the ground. They resorted to violence, wringing his neck. Not content with handcuffing him, they tied his body with a rope before throwing him into a vehicle. 
					
					 There were many cases in which south Korean youth and students and pro-reunification champions went back to south Korea across the demarcation line in Panmunjom only to be persecuted and thrown behind bars. But this is the first time that the pro-reunification patriot was put to such unimaginable fascist suppression in the eyes of the world.
					
					 The south Korean group of traitors is bringing charges of "infiltration and escape" and "encouragement  and appraisal" against Ro under the draconic "Security Law", asserting that he  went to the north without going through necessary procedures and praised the social system in the north.
					
					 Such wicked conservative media as Chosun Ilbo are busy kicking up an anti- DPRK smear campaign, blaming his every activity there and letting  loose a cascade of vituperation against him.
					
					 Not satiated with rubbing salt into the wounds of fellow countrymen grieving over the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the Lee group threw Ro behind bars though he went back to south Korea after expressing condolences over the demise of the father of the nation. History will certainly judge the group for such crimes against the nation, reunification and ethics.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Abuse of Human Rights
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Abuse of Human Rights
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea arrested Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), on Thursday when he crossed over the Demarcation Line in Panmunjom after visiting Pyongyang.
					 The arrest has pushed the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea into fury.
					
					 Heard from different parts of the country are roar of anger shouting "There's no ground for Ro Su Hui to be detained" and "Set free Ro Sui Hui, a reunification champion, at once".
					
					 Ko Chang Hyok, an old man living in Taedonggang District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 "Watching TV, I was enraged at south Korean hooligans forcibly taking away the vice-chairman.
					
					 Rat-like Lee Myung Bak, mad with confrontation with fellow countrymen, will be mercilessly punished by the pro-reunification patriots."
					
					 Kim Song, living in Rangnang District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 "I saw off in tears Mr. Ro Su Hui in front of the Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower.
					
					 He deserves to be praised by the nation for his just deed for national reunification.
					
					 It is none other than the Lee group that should face a stern punishment by the nation because it leveled gun at the fellow countrymen in mourning over the great national loss and barred south Koreans' condolence visit to Pyongyang."
					
					 A student at Kim Il Sung University, Jong Myong Son, said:
					
					 "The Lee Myung Bak group's barbaric act of abusing human rights touched off resentment among us students.
					
					 Now I am eager to wipe out this group of gangsters to the last one."

articles.title: DPRK Women Enraged at S. Korean Regime's Unethical Deed
articles.content:
DPRK Women Indignant at S. Korean Regime's Unethical Deed
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), was forcibly taken away by south Korean agents just after he crossed over the Demarcation Line (DL) in Panmunjom.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Pak Yong Hui, member of the North Headquarters of Pomminryon, Jang Kum Suk, manager of the Moranbong Unha Garment Factory, and Kim Myong Suk, vice-chairwoman of the C.C., Democratic Women's Union of Korea.
					
					 Q: No sooner had Ro Su Hui crossed over the DL than he was forcibly taken away in south Korea. What do you think about it?
					
					 Pak: It was horrible.
					
					 Ro is a pro-reunification patriot who came to Pyongyang to mourn the death of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the great loss to the nation.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean agents handcuffed, tied and forcibly took him away, treating him like an animal under the eyes of people.
					
					 Worse still, the south Korean group of traitors kicked off a racket of defaming the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in the area south of Panmunjom in coincidence with Ro's return.
					
					 This is another intolerable challenge and provocation to the entire nation.
					
					 Those anti-reunification confrontational maniacs, indifferent to the national reconciliation and unity, will be bound to face harsh punishment of Heaven.
					
					 Q: Witnessing the arrest of Ro in Panmunjom, you shouted to the south Korean agents, "Are you Koreans?"  Please tell me about your feelings.
					
					 Jang: I can hardly repress my resentment.
					
					 The south Korean agents pounced upon Ro Su Hui nearing 70 years of age and snatched flowers and reunification flag from him and trampled them. Those agents were gangsters.
					
					 It is so shameful for the south Korean authorities to illegalize the visit to the north, where fellow countrymen live in, while taking no issue with the visit to the United States. It is also ridiculous for them to incriminate any praise of the DPRK while currying favor with the U.S. master.
					
					 Those villains, the traitors to the nation, should be wiped out to the last one.
					
					 Q: I think Ro Su Hui's Pyongyang visit can never be incriminated in view of the traditional manners and customs or national reconciliation and unity, but should be praised as a patriotic deed by the entire nation.
					
					 Kim: You're right. It is none other than the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors that should be severely punished by the nation as it leveled gun at the fellow countrymen in mourning over the nation's great loss and hindered south Koreans' condolence visits to Pyongyang.
					
					 There is a saying that every sin brings its punishment with it. The Lee group of rats will face a stern punishment by all the Korean people for its hideous crimes committed against the nation and humanity.

articles.title: Division-1 Football Tournament under Way in DPRK
articles.content:
Division-1 Football Tournament under Way in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Division-1 football tournament for innovation of techniques is now going on in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The tournament, kicked off on June 15, involves 12 men's teams and 9 women's teams.
					
					 Topping the standings in men's teams as of July 5 are April 25, Rimyongsu, Amnokgang and Sobaeksu and, in women's teams, Ponghwasan, Sobaeksu and April 25.
					
					 The tournament will run till July 12.

articles.title: Mt. Chilbo in DPRK Attracts Chinese Tourists
articles.content:
Mt. Chilbo in DPRK Attracts Chinese Tourists
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The tour of Mt. Chilbo in DPRK by train has drawn an increasing number of Chinese people after its start on April 28. Such tour by Chinese people has been made ten times so far.
					 The latest tour is done by more than 100 tourists from three provinces in Northeast China, Beijing, Shanghai, Guangdong Province and other areas of China, who left Namyang Railway Station in Onsong County, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK, on July 5.
					
					 The tour takes four nights and five days.
					
					 The train is planning to carry two more passenger cars in order to satisfy Chinese people's growing demand for the tour.
					
					 The train service is given once a week, leaving Namyang on Thursdays. After spending one night in the train, tourists enjoy sightseeing in Mt. Chilbo for two nights and three days. Then, they will have a hot-spring bath in Kyongsong County and tour various places in Chongjin City.
					
					 Situated in Myongchon County, North Hamgyong Province, Mt. Chilbo is composed of about 1,000-meter-high peaks, including Samgak Peak in the north and Kkachi and Hyangro peaks in the south with 1,103-meter-high Sangmae Peak as the main. It covers an area of 250 square kilometers, boasting of a number of scenic spots, fantastic rocks and cliffs, local specialities and cultural relics.
					
					 It is known as one of the six famous mountains in Korea, along with Mts. Paektu, Kumgang, Myohyang, Kuwol and Jiri.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of demise of the President.
					 The floral basket was placed before the statues on Saturday.

articles.title: Cambodian Delegation Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cambodian Delegation Pays Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Economic, Social and Cultural Council of the Council of Ministers of Cambodia led by Yim Nolla, senior minister of Cambodia, on Saturday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay homage to them.
					 The members of the delegation placed a bouquet and paid tribute in boundless reverence to the peerlessly great men who made undying contribution to the development of friendly relations between the DPRK and Cambodia.
					
					 The delegation arrived here by air on the same day.

articles.title: Conservancy of Aquatic Resources Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Conservancy of Aquatic Resources Encouraged in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A drive to conserve aquatic resources is being intensified in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Many units related to fishery and land and environmental conservation have conducted various forms of activities to diffuse rich knowledge and common sense of protection and propagation of aquatic resources among local people.
					
					 As a result, broad sections of the masses voluntarily work to conserve aquatic resources in the country.
					
					 Special attention is paid to protecting fries. Water plants have been created in rivers and lakes to provide favorable conditions for fries.
					
					 Pathways were also made in structures standing across rivers to ensure free passage of fishes living in river and sea.
					
					 Meanwhile, strict measures are being taken one after another to prevent any flow of waste material and water into river and sea.
					
					 July is a month for conservancy of aquatic resources in the DPRK.

articles.title: Pyongyang Hosiery Factory
articles.content:
Pyongyang Hosiery Factory
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the dear respected Kim Jong Un visited the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, indicating ways for the factory to put its production on a normal basis.
					 In this regard, KCNA had an interview with Manager Ri Sung Hui, Chief Engineer Ri Thae Sok and a worker, Kim Kuk Sim, of the factory. 
					
					 Q: I would like to hear about feelings of the employees at the factory recently visited by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Ri Sung Hui: They are now full of a high degree of enthusiasm. 
					
					 Our factory was visited by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un two years ago.
					
					 Encouraged by Kim Jong Un's recent visit, all the employees have turned out in increased production of hosiery.
					
					 Ri Thae Sok: The modernly-equipped factory strives to boost the production of hosiery of different models and patterns by running all the equipment at full capacity and speeding up the development of hosiery pattern designing program.
					
					 More than 200 kinds of hosiery are produced at present.
					
					 Kim Kuk Sim: I was highly honored to meet with the dear respected Kim Jong Un at worksite.
					
					 He was pleased to see a variety of hosiery, saying that people would like them. His recent visit encourages all the workers at the factory to boost the production.
					
					 With his deep love for the people kept in my mind, I will do my best to increase the hosiery production.

articles.title: Taejon Liberation Operation Conducted in Korean War
articles.content:
Taejon Liberation Operation Conducted in Korean War
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean War (1950-1953) recorded a large number of battles, which still remain mysterious for the world's military experts.
					 Typical of them is the Taejon liberation operation conducted by the Korean People's Army. The operation based on unique war tactics is still studied at military academies in Europe as a model of modern siege warfare.
					
					 At that time the enemy concentrated huge forces and weapons in Taejon City after surrendering the city of Seoul and the defense line along the River Kum to the KPA in counterattack.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung indicated the orientation and ways of an operation to encircle Taejon by suggesting that the southeastern part of the city be intercepted before the arrival of the enemy's reinforcements. At his instruction, KPA soldiers made 40-km-long march overnight to put that area under their control.
					
					 The operation to liberate Taejon was launched at 5 a.m. of July 20, 1950.
					
					 Under the support of artillery fire the KPA soldiers rapidly broke through the enemy's defense line and fought a fierce urban warfare.
					
					 Amazed at such strong attack, the enemy ran away toward the south and southeastern area of the city only to be wiped out by KPA units awaiting the fleeing troops there.
					
					 In the battle the U.S. 24th division, called "undefeated division", was annihilated and its Commander Dean arrested by a young KPA soldier.
					
					 A U.S. officer, who participated in the battle, said that the U.S. forces' defeat was ascribable to the KPA's unique tactics.

articles.title: People Fascinated by Kim Il Sung's Tenderness
articles.content:
People Fascinated by Kim Il Sung's Tenderness
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Gomes, ex-president of Portugal, admitted that President Kim Il Sung was a great man who moved the world's people with his benevolence.
					 Kim Il Sung was the great sun as he gave vitality to all people with benevolent love. He treated anyone as friendly as his comrades and brothers and sisters, regardless of his official post.
					
					 Fascinated by his humanity, magnanimity and generosity, many people turned to be his friends and disciples.
					
					 When meeting Gomes staying in the DPRK in July Juche 70 (1981), Kim Il Sung said he felt seeing an old friend and appreciated his contribution to the friendship between the two countries.
					
					 Gomes came to Pyongyang again next year, and the President kindly invited him to visit the DPRK often as his close friend, encouraging him to work together for the sake of the people and for independence of Europe and the developing nations.
					
					 In September 1991, the President entertained to a party Gomes and other foreign dignitaries who attended an event for supporting Korea's reunification. At the party he urged them to take cuisines, jokingly telling them about the origin of dishes. His personality instantly gripped them by heart.
					
					 Many world dignitaries praised Kim Il Sung as the peerlessly great person attracting all people. Among them were Francois Mitterrand, ex-president of France, Wilfred Burchett, a journalist and writer of Australia, and Candellaria, a Cuban woman lawyer.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Lauds Kim Il Sung's Leadership Feats for Reunification
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Lauds Kim Il Sung's Leadership Feats for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- As always, strong yearnings for President Kim Il Sung pervades the whole country this July, too.
					 The people are looking back with deep emotion on the undying feats he performed for the sacred cause of national reunification.
					
					 On July 4, Juche 61 (1972) the July 4 joint statement was solemnly proclaimed at home and abroad. Its keynote was the three principles of national reunification --independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity.
					
					 This was a historic event as the north and the south agreed for the first time on the principle of reunification, a shining fruition of the President's ardent patriotism.
					
					 The nation's reunification movement at last greeted a turning point from which to advance based on the three principles.
					
					 Despite twists and setbacks, the north and the south have steadily intensified multi-faceted dialogue, cooperation, reconciliation and cooperation since then.
					
					 The past decades and annals are recorded with the undying reunification leadership feats of the President who initiated the 10-point programme for the great unity of the entire nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo based on the three principles, a cornerstone of national reunification.
					
					 It was thanks to his guidance that the three charters for national reunification, which indicate the orientation and ways for building the driving force of reunification and the appearance of a unified country and ways for carrying them out, was provided.
					
					 On the New Year's Day in 1994, the year of his death, the President delivered New Year address in which he called for leaving the future generation with a reunified country. 
					
					 On July 7 the same year he worked busy getting prepared for the north-south summit. That day he stayed up all night and completed a document on the first page of which he left his sign "Kim Il Sung July 7, 1994."
					
					 But nobody knew that it would be his last sign.
					
					 His last sign reflects his great world incomparable with thousands of monuments.
					
					 This noble sign associated with the undying feats he performed with total dedication all his life became further shining as great Songun commander Kim Jong Il signed the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 On April 15 this year the great Kim Jong Un declared that he would hold hands with anyone who sincerely wishes for the country's reunification and stands for its peace and prosperity. Not only the Koreans but the world people heard this which echoed through like his pledge.
					
					 The Koreans in the north and the south and abroad will convey down through generations the noble patriotic intentions of the President and his undying leadership feats for reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Exposes Truth about S. Korean Authorities' Ruckus for "Eliminating Forces Following North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Exposes Truth about S. Korean Authorities' Ruckus for "Eliminating Forces Following North"
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet conservative group is frantically resorting to fascist crackdown upon the progressive and pro-reform forces under the pretext of "eliminating forces following the north".
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This amounts to a total denial and open challenge to the compatriots' ideology and social system and vicious political terror aimed at turning the south Korean society into a theater of confrontation of ideologies in a bid to stamp out the progressive and pro-reform forces aspiring after justice and patriotism by linking them with the DPRK.
					
					 Referring to the dastardly aim sought through the ruckus for "eliminating forces following the north," the commentary goes on:
					
					 By labeling the progressive and pro-reform forces as "pro-north leftist forces" linked with the DPRK, the puppet forces seek to kick off "a coloring offensive" in a bid to mislead the public opinion and achieve their despicable political purpose.
					
					  Thrown into a tight corner owing to the strong call of people of various circles for "judging the regime" in the run-up to "presidential election", the group of traitors is noisily trumpeting about "forces following the north" in an effort to calm it down.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak and "the Saenuri Party" are working hard to turn the "election" into a showdown between the "leftist forces following north" and the conservative forces, not showdown between progressive forces and the forces which derailed the "state administration" in a bid to win over the middle-of-the-road forces to their side and escape from the people's judgment.
					
					 Facts go to clearly prove that the Lee group's ruckus for "eliminating forces following the north" is nothing but a heinous political offensive to prolong its remaining days and stay the conservative regime in power through escalated confrontation between the north and the south and the crackdown upon the progressive and pro-reform forces.
					
					 The puppet conservative group would be well advised to behave itself, mindful that the ruckus is as foolish as falling into the pitfall dug by itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Remarks
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak was reported to have blustered recently that "the second Yonphyong naval skirmish was not an accidental but a premeditated one caused by the north" and "in case of the north's future provocation, the south will make several times stronger retaliation." He went the lengths of praising those killed in the skirmish as "guardian god of sea."
					 Rodong Sinmun on Saturday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 What Lee uttered is nothing but drumbeats and agitation made by the maniac hell-bent on fanning up extreme antagonism and distrust between the north and the south and sparking off a new armed conflict.
					
					 Finding it hard to escape sledge-hammer blows of history, the group of traitors is making its last-ditch efforts to prolong its remaining days. 
					
					 The reckless act of the traitor once again clearly shows who is the arch criminal escalating the tensions on the Korean Peninsula and bringing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for Lee to cry out for "retaliation" as if he had a sort of "muscle" though he is more dead than alive as a politician.
					
					 No confrontation and war racket to seek a way out of its abyss of ruin would help the Lee group improve his difficult position. 
					
					 The warmongers whose fate is as miserable as tiger moths are bound to perish in the flames of the resistance of all compatriots due to rage before long.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Drop Its Policy of Aggression against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Drop Its Policy of Aggression against DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists have so far regarded Korea as an important strategic vantage for realizing its ambition for world domination. This policy of aggression remains unchanged.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The U.S. set forth a strategy of giving importance to Asia-Pacific for the purpose of realizing its ambition to invade the DPRK which it failed to do in the 1950s, occupying the Eurasian continent and dominating the world.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. imperialists seek to put the DPRK under their military control and use the Korean Peninsula as a strategic bridgehead for realizing their dream of invading the Eurasian continent and the rest of the world, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The geopolitical position of Korea remains unchanged. It was once mercilessly trampled underfoot as a theater of scramble among big powers. But the DPRK now stands as a full-fledged political and military power. 
					
					 It is a mistake if any country thinks it can pressurize the DPRK to pave the way for its war of aggression and offer the whole territory as shambles of a war.
					
					 The U.S. should abandon its Cold War thinking pattern. It should opt for respecting the sovereignty of the DPRK, giving up its hostile policy toward it and concluding a peace accord with it. The U.S. should seek a way of developing the bilateral relations from the stand of equality and mutual benefit. This is also beneficial to the development of international relations.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists had better drop their policy of aggression against the DPRK and behave themselves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Scenario for World Domination
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Scenario for World Domination
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has long regarded Korea as an important strategic vantage point for implementing their scenario for world domination. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a bylined article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 From a geographical point of view, Korea is a gate to the continent linked with China and Asian region of Russia and it is close to Japan. That is why, the U.S. has regarded the Korean Peninsula as a "strategic vantage-point" from which it may make a military strike at any part of Northeast Asia and "bridgehead to the continent" and "advanced base in Northeast Asia" through which it may invade China and Russia. 
					
					 Before and after the end of World War II the U.S. attached great political importance to Korea. 
					
					 At that time the U.S. claimed Korea was an advanced base in the East in which the U.S. was standing in confrontation with socialism and the point of political and military standoff between East and West. It was much afraid of the fact that democratic policies were implemented in the northern half of Korea and the great victory of the Korean people demonstrating the might of a new democratic state all over the world was exerting influence not only in Asia but the rest of the world.
					
					 From long ago, the U.S. set Korea as a theatre of political struggle on which hinged the victory in the confrontation between capitalism and socialism in Northeast Asia and regarded this confrontation as a key link decisive of the fate of American-style "democracy" and the fate of the entire capitalist world.
					
					 Once U.S. war merchant Dulles described Korea as "a dagger" to cut "meat" of Asia. 
					
					 His words meant that if the U.S. put Korea under its control, it might eat "meat" of Asia as it liked and, furthermore, "land" on the Eurasian continent. 
					
					 In the 1950s the U.S. ignited the Korean War, regarding Korea as "heart" of Northeast Asia, advanced base in West Pacific and south Korea, in particular, as market for its surplus goods, colony and logistic base for invading the whole of Korea and a bridgehead for invasion of the Asian continent and strategic vantage point for implementing its scenario for world domination.
					
					 This scenario of the U.S. still remains unchanged. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have staged ceaseless anti-DPRK military maneuvers and stepped up arms buildup in the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity, straining the situation. This eloquently proves that the aggressive nature of the U.S. imperialists remains unchanged and it will never change.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Pro-Reunification People Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Pro-Reunification People Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean group of traitors is kicking up a wholesale crackdown after Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), went back to south Korea via Panmunjom on July 5.
					 The group of traitors hurled gangsters of the puppet army, the Ministry of Unification and the Intelligence Service (IS) into Panmunjom to brutally take Ro away like a baggage just as he crossed the demarcation line. They brought him to the Phaju Police Station in Kyonggi Province at which the joint investigation team made up of prosecution, police and IS are inquiring him. They also committed such fascist tyranny as forcibly searching Ro's house and the office of the Pomminryon South Headquarters and arresting its secretary general without warrant.
					
					 The group set in motion such wicked and mean human scum as those of the "alliance of the elders" and the "society of families of south Korean abductees" to hold "protest rallies" in Panmunjom area and before the office of the Pomminryon South Headquarters.
					
					 What is intolerable is that the riff-raffs and human scum gathered in the southern gate of the "Unification Bridge" in Phaju City of Kyonggi Province at the instigation of the group of traitors to perpetrate such hideous and shuddering acts as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 Ro praised the shining reality of the DPRK and denounced the Lee Myung Bak fascist dictatorial regime. Ultra-right conservative media including Chosun Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo and Daily NK, as if they waited for the chance, are terming his deed crimes to mislead the public. 
					
					 Ro visited Pyongyang to express condolences over the great loss to the nation. The Lee group kicked off a whirlwind of suppression of pro-reunification patriotic forces in south Korea and confrontation with the fellow countrymen, daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK with the return of Ro, a pro-reunification patriotic figure, to south Korea as a momentum. This was another hideous provocation against the DPRK and an unethical brutal act and a grave crime against reunification as it is blatant challenge to the aspiration and desire of all the Koreans for the unity of the nation and the country's reunification.
					
					 It is quite natural for Ro to visit Pyongyang as a member of the Korean nation to express humblest tribute to the sun of the nation, the peerlessly great man who devoted all his life to the country, fellow countrymen, national unity and reunification, on behalf of all south Koreans' strong yearning for him.
					
					 The group of traitors labeled Ro's Pyongyang visit as "an infiltration and escape" and "encouragement and appraisal of the social system in the north" and the like. These are groundless charges and sheer sophism.
					
					 How can it be a crime that he visited the land of the same nation to share bitter sorrow and called for reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation?
					
					  Rare to be found in the world are such despicable confrontation maniacs as the Lee Myung Bak group which neither allows south Koreans to visit the north nor permits them to come back home for the mere reason that the north has differing ideology, political view and ism.
					
					 The Lee group is a horde of pro-U.S. lackeys and immoral bandits who prohibit visits of south Koreans to the north where compatriots live and ban acts of praising compatriots, while allowing themselves to frequent the U.S. and please their American master. 
					
					 Ro's Pyongyang visit was very just and patriotic deed to be admired by all Koreans in view of the traditional beautiful manners of Koreans who have shared grief with the neighbors and in the light of the present stirring reality which calls for paving a new way of achieving reconciliation and unity at an early date after defusing confrontation and distrust.
					
					 Nevertheless, the traitors against reunification treated pro-reunification patriots like offenders, brutally cracking down upon them. This brought into bolder relief the true colors of outrageous confrontation maniacs and rogues without an equal.
					
					 Such behavior of the group is nothing but the last-ditch efforts to escalate the north-south confrontation in a bid to justify its bankrupt policy of confrontation with the DPRK, step up the fascist crackdown upon pro-reunification patriotic forces in south Korea through the racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" and thus realize its daydream of staying in power.
					
					 Witnessing the thrice-cursed atrocities the puppet gangsters committed against Ro which put even animals into the shade and their slandering of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the people in the DPRK and all other compatriots and the whole world are increasing their voices critical of the group of traitors, hardly repressing their resentment against it.
					
					 The group has been keen on such unimaginable hideous crimes as leveling the gun at the people in the north who were grieving over the great loss to the nation, banning the south Koreans from paying condolatory visit to Pyongyang and dampening the ardent desire of all Koreans to praise General Secretary Kim Jong Il. It is unanimous will of all Koreans to settle accounts to the last with the Lee group no matter how frequently the sky and land may change.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the band of traitors who perpetrated such hideous crimes as gravely hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, their lifeline.
					
					 The enemies with whom the Korean nation can never live under the same sky will never be able to escape the punishment of Heaven.
					
					 The traitors will have to experience what dear price they will have to pay for their crimes before they face their end.

articles.title: Koreans in China Denounce Lee Myung Bak Group's Barbarity
articles.content:
Koreans in China Denounce Lee Myung Bak Group's Barbarity 
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Koreans in China made public statements in denunciation of the south Korean Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its brigandish suppression of Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon). 
					 The General Association of Koreans in China in its statement on Thursday said that Ro's Pyongyang visit was a token of due courtesy prompted by the desire to share sorrow over the great loss to the nation as a member of the same nation, and a righteous and heroic action to achieve national unity and reunification. It can not be a reason of suppression, it said.
					
					 The statement branded the unwarranted fascist crackdown on Ro by the south Korean puppet forces as an unpardonable crime that violates freedom and rights of reunification movement, defying the nation's tradition and conscience of a pro-reunification figure to contribute to national reconciliation and peace.
					
					 The situation proves that it would be hard to expect democracy of the south Korean society nor the reunification of the country as long as the south Korean conservative regime is left intact, it added.
					
					 The Headquarters of Koreans in China of Pomminryon and the China Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration also issued a joint statement on Friday.
					
					 It said the Lee Myung Bak regime committed fascist crackdown on the pro-reunification champion and is set to punish him on charges of violation of "Security Law".
					
					 The joint statement went on:
					
					 With this situation as an occasion the Lee group seeks to kick up wholesale suppression of reunification movement organizations which support the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and insist on their implementation, calling them "pro-north and leftist faction" and "forces following the north". Lurking behind this is a foolish ambition to win in the upcoming "presidential election".
					
					 The south Korean "government" authorities should immediately release the illegally detained patriotic personages including Ro Su Hui and ensure their free activities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried on Nepali Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried on Nepali Paper
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Nepali paper Nepal Today on July 2 carried the full text of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification."
					 The work, published on August 4, 1997, deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for reunifying the country. It formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme for great national unity and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for reunification.
					
					 The work also indicates the tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification on the basis of the charters. 
					
					 The paper carried portraits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed in Cambodia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed in Cambodia on July 2.
					 Deputy Prime Minister in charge of the royal palace of Cambodia Kong Sam Ol was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at an instruction of King Samdech Norodom Sihamoni.
					
					 The committee decided to fix the period from July 2 to 15 as a period of remembering Kim Il Sung, give wide media publicity to the great exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for the Korean revolution, the cause of global independence and the development of the friendly relations with Cambodia and organize colorful political and cultural events.

articles.title: Myanmar, Indonesian Figures Laud Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Myanmar, Indonesian Figures Laud Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering President Kim Il Sung and film shows were held in Myanmar and Indonesia on June 29 and July 1 to mark the 18th anniversary of his demise.
					 Films shown included Korean films "Arms of Korea" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 The director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute said the progressive mankind's reverence for Kim Il Sung remains as same as in his lifetime, adding:
					
					 He opened the way for humankind to follow by founding the Juche idea.
					
					 Irrespective of idea, political view, skin complexion and language, whoever met the President was struck with admiration by his great personality.
					
					 Even though he passed away, his idea and greatness will remain long in the hearts of humankind.
					
					 The director general of the Badja Machine Co. of Indonesia said Kim Il Sung started his revolutionary activities in his teens, liberated the country by waging an armed struggle and turned the DPRK into a socialist power.
					
					 Thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, everything will go well in the DPRK.
					
					 An official of another Indonesian company said Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a matchless impregnable fortress by dint of the Songun policy.

articles.title: Africa Should Follow Juche Idea: Democratic Congolese Figure
articles.content:
Africa Should Follow Juche Idea: Democratic Congolese Figure
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Democratic Congo, lauded validity and vitality of the Juche idea, calling for following it.
					 He spoke as follows at an international meeting on the theme of "Peace, unity and development of Africa" hosted by the World Peace Council in Brazzaville, Congo from June 18 to 20:
					
					 We have to face the maneuvers of the imperialists with the strength of unity, and this unity has to be based on a single idea.
					
					 The Juche idea is just what we have to hold fast.
					
					 There would be nothing impossible when we turn out for the sake of the African people, aware that we are the masters of our own destiny.
					
					 The Korean revolution has emerged ever-victorious with neither turns and twists nor failure under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 The situation of the DPRK teaches us what idea we should take as our guiding idea.
					
					 It is our sacred duty to achieve African development free from neo- colonialism of the imperialists by preserving the national character of each country guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 We should fight against the U.S. moves to stifle socialist Korea.

articles.title: Bulgarian Organization Lauds Kim Il Sung's Life
articles.content:
Bulgarian Organization Lauds Kim Il Sung's Life
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued bulletin No. 5 to mark the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It carried several articles with his smiling portrait.
					
					 It said under the title "Eternal President" that despite the lapse of many years since his death the Korean people keeps holding Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal President, calling their country Kim Il Sung's Korea and their nation Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 He opened the way for the revival of the Korean nation, safeguarded sovereignty and dignity of socialist Korea and built up an original socialist power centered on the people, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defense.
					
					 His shining life and feats will last forever, the article said.
					
					 The bulletin under the title "Pyongyang Declaration" introduced his greatness as a world political elder.
					
					 The adoption of the Pyongyang Declaration was a historic event in strengthening unity and solidarity of parties aspiring after socialism and advancing the socialist cause.

articles.title: July 4 Joint Statement Favored in Peru
articles.content:
July 4 Joint Statement Favored in Peru
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a press release on July 2 to mark the 40th anniversary of the historic July 4 joint statement.
					 The committee said in the press release that the statement is the most fair and aboveboard principle for reunification as it makes it possible to solve the issue of Korea's reunification peacefully by concerted efforts of the Koreans free from foreign interference and that it is also a programme for reunification to be consistently held to together with the June 15 north-south joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The press release noted: On the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the statement our committee pays high tribute to the great President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who performed great feats through their indefatigable efforts for the country's reunification.
					
					 We are sure that the DPRK and Korean people will foil the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime to keep Korea divided indefinitely and surely emerge victorious in the struggle for the country's reunification on the basis of the north-south statement and declarations.
					
					 The Korean nation is the inseparable, homogenous nation.
					
					  Korea is one!

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung Remembered in China
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung Remembered in China
 Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting took place in Beijing on July 5 with the approach of the 18th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were officials of the China Association for International Friendly Contact and the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact and those of families related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to China and his embassy officials.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The vice-president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact said that Kim Il Sung, the founder of the party, state and army of the DPRK and the great leader of the Korean people, performed great exploits to go down in the history of the arduous struggle for achieving national independence and building power and socialist society. The President's was a revolutionary life, the speaker added.
					
					 He recalled that the President forged close relations with revolutionaries of the elder generation in China and positively developed them, noting that the Chinese people would always remember him..
					
					 Kim Il Sung will always live in the hearts of the peoples of the two countries, he stressed.
					
					 Feng Yila, daughter of Feng Zhongyun, a Chinese man related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, recollected with deep emotion that General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un bestowed profound benevolence upon her family even after the demise of the President.
					
					 She expressed hope that the Korean people would register signal successes in socialist construction by carrying out the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. She also expressed wish that the close friendship between the peoples of China and the DPRK would shine generation after generation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia la funcion modelo de la Banda Moranbong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia la funcion modelo de la Banda Moranbong
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el dia 6 la funcion modelo de la recien fundada Banda Moranbong.
					La organizacion de esa banda en el nivel del nuevo siglo obedece al gran proposito del Maximo Dirigente de registrar una innovacion en el sector de literatura y arte este ano en que se inicia la nueva centuria de la Corea del Juche.
					
					Quedo iniciada la significativa funcion modelo anunciando a todo el mundo el nacimiento de la banda fundada hace unos meses apenas.
					
					En la funcion dividida en dos partes se presentaron los programas de diversos generos, tales como la musica ligera "Arirang", el quinteto femenino "Aprendamos", la musica ligera "Yepuni", la musica ligera y cancion "Triunfadores", la trio femenino "Tejedora de seda de Nyongbyon", el cuarteto de instrumentos de cuerda "No podemos vivir fuera de su regazo", las musicas ligeras extranjeras  "Chardash", "Victoria", "Cancion del gitano", el sexteto femenino "Bandera roja flameando", la musica ligera "Suite de canciones de fabulas del mundo".
					
					En la ocasion, los ejecutantes demostraron bien el temperamento combativo y la indoblegable fuerza espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente, avanzan por la victoria final de la construccion de Estado prospero.
					
					La funcion se caracterizo por su contenido revolucionario y combativo y por su forma renovada, original, contemporanea y popular.
					
					Con sus probados y habituados metodos de ejecucion, mas de 10 instrumentalistas hicieron repercutir una melodia majestuosa y rica al igual que una orquesta de gran tamano mientras los cantantes jovenes caldearon la escena de emocion y jubilo con sus canciones encantadoras.
					
					Terminada la funcion, Kim Jong Un respondio con su mano a las aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los creadores y artistas de la Banda Moranbong hayan ofrecido esta funcion de alto nivel ideo-artistico usando su revolucionario modo de creacion, les felicito por la exitosa funcion y les expreso agradecimiento en nombre del Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					Volvio a apreciar el espectaculo destacando que este impulsa la revolucion y la construccion, entrana el impetu de la epoca y tiene contenido y forma nuevos y frescos.
					
					Al decir que todos los ejecutantes y cantantes son prometedores, evaluo especialmente a Sonu Hyang Hui, jefa de la banda, por su excelente direccion.
					
					Asigno la tarea de desarrollar continua y equilibradamente las musicas tradicionales y las populares conforme a la demanda de la epoca y la aspiracion del pueblo y a la idiosincrasia de los coreanos.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y artistas de la Banda Moranbong cumpliran bien en el futuro tambien con su mision de trompetero, motor y buen companero de los militares y habitantes en la lucha por glorificar nuestra patria, herencia patriotica dejada por el Presidente         Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Le acompanaron en disfrutar la funcion Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Ki Nam, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Choe Pu Il, Kim Myong Guk, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, los funcionarios, creadores, artistas, escritores y periodistas de las ramas de literatura y arte, prensa e informacion y de las instituciones de educacion del arte.

articles.title: Vocero de CRPP denuncia palabrotes provocativos de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Vocero de CRPP denuncia palabrotes provocativos de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que el traidor Lee Myung Bak volvio a acusar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio el dia 7 una respuesta a la ACNC:
					El dia 3 el traidor Lee dijo que "se enfrentara varias veces mas duro al Norte si este provoca" y solicito a un pais que se transmitiera tal postura. Ademas, agrego que el combate naval en Mar Oeste de Corea en 2002 fue provocado por el Norte a base de la estrategia.
					
					El 29 de junio, Lee acuso a la RPDC diciendo que los incidentes de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" y de canonazos de la isla Yonphyong constituyen una provocacion premeditada del Norte, y hace poco durante su gira por los paises extranjeros, dijo en tono acalorado que "si provoca el Norte, le haria recibir mayor castigo".
					
					Esto es una desesperacion ultima de un cadaver vivo en visperas de su muerte.
					
					Ahora la banda traidora se tiembla de inquietud y miedo extremados ante el coraje de venganza despiadada de los militares y civiles de la RPDC  frente a sus crimenes antinacionales y antieticos.
					
					La crisis de gobernacion del traidor Lee llego a un estado irreparable antes de terminar el periodo de su mandato y la camarilla traidora esta a punto de  arruinarse por los casos de corrupcion de tamano especial de sus parientes y colegas y las  maniobras para concertar el convenio militar con Japon.
					
					Los disparates provocativos de Lee devienen una accion miserable destinada a animar a sus camarillas empapadas de delirio de persecucion por sus crimenes cometidos ante la nacion, rescatar ni en lo minimo su popularidad desgastada, desviar la opinion publica muy indignada, y asi salir de su peor crisis.
					
					Debido a las locuras imprudentes de la banda de Lee bajo el amparo de su amo norteamericano, se ha hecho mas tensa la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y mas grave el peligro de guerra.
					
					Las circunstancias creadas comprueban evidentemente que el destructor de la paz en la Peninsula Coreana es precisamente EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					Aunque la banda de Lee actua con frenesi bajo el abrigo de EE.UU., este tampoco podra protegerla de nuestro despiadado fuego de castigo.
					
					Es la ley que el final de un lacayo es tragico y le caen solo el desamparo, la destruccion y la muerte.
					
					Si el traidor sigue actuando con imprudencia, repetira los destinos tan tragicos de sus antecesores Syngman Rhee y Park Chung Hee y de los lacayos proyanquis del Sur de Vietnam.

articles.title: APRP publica nota de condena a las autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
APRP publica nota de condena a las autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 7 de julio (ACNC) -- Las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas arrestaron violentamente al vicepresidente de la direccion surena de la APRP, Ro Su Hui, quien regreso al Sur de Corea tras visitar a Pyongyang para expresar condolencias por el gran duelo nacional, y libran una campana de represion fascista contra esa entidad y de enfrentamiento con la connacional Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El pasado dia 5, arrestaron a Ro Su Hui estrangulando su cuello y atando sus manos y piernas a la vista de los norcoreanos que se reunieron en Phanmunjom para darle los saludos de despedida.
					
					Luego, lo sometieron al interrogatorio movilizando al grupo de investigacion conjunta compuesto por la fiscalia, la policia y el "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia" y lo ultrajan mental y fisicamente.
					
					Anteriormente, registraron la oficina de la Direccion Surena de la APRP y los domicilios de Ro Su Hui y el secretario general, y detuvieron a este ultimo. 
					
					Con motivo del regreso de Ro, incitaron a las entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas, incluyendo la "Alianza de Padres" y la "Sociedad de Soldados y Policias Invalidos", a cometer nuevamente la peor locura de insultar la maxima dignidad de la connacional RPDC.
					
					La visita a Pyongyang del vicepresidente Ro Su Hui, en calidad de miembro de la nacion consanguinea, partio de su voluntad de expresar profundas condolencias sobre el gran duelo nacional, compartir la tristeza con los norcoreanos y abrir el camino de reconciliacion, unidad y reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					No merece la represion en ningun caso la conducta de Ro muy justa tanto en vista de la etica y las costumbres tradicionales como para la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion.
					
					  Ahora todos los coreanos y todo el mundo estan consternados de la barbaridad de las autoridades surcoreanas que arremetieron a Ro Su Hui, de vuelta a casa, y lo llevaron esposando sus manos y amarrando su cuerpo con la cuerda.
					
					  Las direcciones nortena, surena y de ultramar de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) califican esa fechoria de imperdonable crimen antietico, anti-derechos humanos y anti-reunificacion y la denuncian categoricamente en nombre de toda la nacion.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas pretenden condenar a duras penas a Ro Su Hui imputandole los cargos absurdos estipulados en la "ley de seguridad", tales como "estimulo y elogio", "comunicacion y reunion" e "infiltracion y fuga".
					
					Aprovechando el regreso de Ro, intentan intensificar la campana de "purga de las fuerzas pro-Norte" y la ofensiva de "coloracion", promover el enfrentamiento fratricida, exterminar a las fuerzas del movimiento pro-reunificacion, salir de la extremada crisis de gobernacion y realizar la ambicion de retomar el Poder.
					
					Pero, la historia y todos los coreanos ajustaran sin falta las cuentas de los irreparables crimenes de toda indole cometidos por las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas en su mandato y castigaran severamente a las fuerzas conservadoras anti-reunificacion.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben pedir disculpas ahora mismo a todos los compatriotas por sus siniestras acciones de represion contra Ro Su Hui y excarcelar incondicionalmente a el y todas las personalidades pro-reunificacion injustamente encarceladas.
					
					Las entidades conservadoras y ultraderechistas, que sumandose a la campana de "purga de las fuerzas pro-Norte", actuan demencialmente para acabar con las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion incluyendo la Direccion Surena de la APRP, deben cesar ahora mismo sus tremendos actos de provocacion que buscan el enfrentamiento y la guerra fratricidas.
					
					En solidaridad con todos los sectores sociales dentro y fuera del pais, la APRP librara activamente el movimiento para abolir la "ley de seguridad", que fomenta la guerra fratricida, frustrar rotundamente las acciones de confrontacion entre connacionales de las fuerzas conservadoras anti-reunificacion y acoger otra vez la epoca de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".

articles.title: Firmado en Moscu tratado RPDC-Rusia
articles.content:
Firmado en Moscu tratado RPDC-Rusia
Moscu, 6 de julio (ACNC) -- Fue rubricado el dia 5 en esta capital entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Federacion Rusa el tratado sobre el orden en las fronteras entre ambas partes.
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes el embajador Kim Yong Jae y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en Rusia, por la parte coreana, y por la rusa, el vicecanciller Igor Morgulov y los miembros del sector correspondiente.
					
					Kim e Igor suscribieron el tratado.
